content:
Can you describe a baseball game using 6 adjectives? Please provide your response in [JSON data] format.
[Rewritten Prompt(MUST contain a specific JSON data code as input)]:
{
   "exciting": true,
   "competitive": true,
   "intense": true,
   "thrilling": true,
   "unpredictable": true,
   "nail-biting": true
}

```json
{
   "exciting": true,
   "competitive": true,
   "intense": true,
   "thrilling": true,
   "unpredictable": true,
   "nail-biting": true
}
```
